transcript: I'll give you two of my favorite ways to do this one I take the frame of the veteran which is what if the same thing happened a thousand times in a row what would I feel on the thousandth time well if it probably wouldn't be that big of a deal then it doesn't need to be that big of a deal now the second thing I do is that I'll literally think of myself zooming out until the stars are so big that the Earth doesn't even exist and at that point I also realize that it probably doesn't matter
